title: Prairie Wolf Pack
text:
The Prairie Wolf Pack is a Canadian <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> team representing the <a href="Canadian%20Prairies">Prairies region</a> in the <a href="Canadian%20Rugby%20Championship">Canadian Rugby Championship</a>. The Wolf Pack's inaugural season includes a home game at the Calgary Rugby Park against <a href="The%20Rock%20%28rugby%20team%29">The Rock</a> and away games at the <a href="BC%20Bears">BC Bears</a> and <a href="Ontario%20Blues">Ontario Blues</a>.
